page.title: 09STURRY (cont)
page.content: The shopping facilities in Sturry seem to be adequate for the local inhabitants, with one exception no bank.There are 2 Private Junior Schools, one actually in the village itself. Milner Court (which belongs to the Kings School)was given by Lord Milner's widow to the village. One Primary-Infant school along the Island Road estate and a Secondary School on the outskirts of Westbere. The Infant School on Sturry Hill is going to be demolished and meanwhile the children have been transfered to the Primary School. There are 3 old people's homes, the biggest, Franklin House, in the village itself. Sturry has a 13th century church situated inside the Tudor Gateway of Sturry.
